issue.title: HadoopFileSystem isn't pickleable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2031](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2031). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently instances of `pa.hdfs.HadoopFileSystem` aren't pickleable. Pickling/unpickling of a `HadoopFileSystem` should create a new instance with the same connection parameters.
